itemDescription: Scottish oculist and Liberal Party politician

wikipedia_page.main: Adam Rolland Rainy (3 April 1862 – 26 August 1911) was a Liberal Party politician in Scotland who sat in the House of Commons for Kilmarnock Burghs. By profession he was a surgeon oculist.

response: * Rev Robert Rainy (1820–1906) and his son Adam Rolland Rainy MP
Their children included the politician Adam Rolland Rainy.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the January 1910 United Kingdom general election

response: Adam Rolland Rainy had been Liberal MP for Kilmarnock Burghs since gaining the seat from the Conservatives in 1906. He died on 26 August 1911 at the youthful age of 49, causing the by-election.
